main event: On 9 July 1955, one flying saucer-shaped object was observed over the ocean in Newport Beach.
interesting points: The object was white and estimated to be 3,000 to 5,000 feet above the ocean., The object was motionless before disappearing into a cloud., It was observed for an unknown duration., The observation was visually reported., Flight 1-6 was instructed to conduct a limited follow-up investigation.
sighted object: one flying saucer-shaped object, white in color
